alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued September 30 at 7:46AM EDT until September 30 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Coastal flooding will continue in Bayside communities of the Upper Keys today. Winds have shifted to the north and decreased, which has allowed water levels to decrease about a foot from the very high levels observed Wednesday night and Thursday, but some flooding of low lying Bayside areas is likely to continue into the weekend. * WHERE...Bayside communities of the Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
